questions.question: Won't JobTread develop these features themselves?
questions.answer: JobTread is focused on building the best construction management platform possible. Some of these features are outside of their vision, so we've built them here.

questions.question: How is this different from what JobTread offers?
questions.answer: We build custom integrations and solutions that are more niche or advanced than the JobTread vision. These enhanced features are built on top of JobTread, so you can continue to use your JobTread data, but with more power.
